Generate percentage label of the interestion/union sizes ratio

Source: R/upset.R
upset_text_percentage.Rd

For use together with intersection_size or intersection_ratio

upset_text_percentage(digits = 0, sep = "")

Arguments

digits

How many digits to show when rounding the percentage?
sep

set to space (' ') if you prefer a whitespace between the number and the \% sign.

Examples

intersection_size(text_aes=ggplot2::aes_(label=upset_text_percentage()))
#> $aes
#> Aesthetic mapping: 
#> * `x` -> `intersection`
#> 
#> $geom
#> $geom[[1]]
#> geom_bar: width = NULL, na.rm = FALSE, orientation = NA
#> stat_count: width = NULL, na.rm = FALSE, orientation = NA
#> position_stack 
#> 
#> $geom[[2]]
